abilities.name: Healing Totem
abilities.description: Deploy a totem that heals nearby targets over time.

abilities.name: Tempest
abilities.description: Create a lightning storm around yourself for 5s, randomly striking nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Weapon attacks chain to nearby enemies for 35% damage for 5 seconds.

abilities.name: Ghost Walk
abilities.description: Become untargetable and gain 40% movement speed for 2s. Removes all debuffs on use.

abilities.name: lightning staff
abilities.description: A staff that creates a channeled beam of lightning.
